sentences.en: A soldier has to confront danger.
Any attempt to defend wilderness preservation must confront and attempt to refute this position.
sentences.cn: 任何为保护荒野而辩护的试图都必须正视并设法驳倒这一论点.

sentences.en: Counsellors encourage victims of crime to confront their emotions.
sentences.cn: 辅导员鼓励罪案受害人直面自己的情感.

sentences.en: He who was usually so full of questions lacked the will to confront her with them.
sentences.cn: 通常有很多疑问的他却缺乏向她质询的决心。

sentences.en: I confronted him with my suspicions, and he admitted everything.
sentences.cn: 我当面向他提出我的怀疑，他什么都承认了。

sentences.en: I could not bring myself to confront him about it.
sentences.cn: 我不忍心就这事和他对质。

sentences.en: It was a new experience for me to confront an impenetrable wall.
sentences.cn: 对我来说,面对一堵穿不过的厚墙是一种从未有过的经历.

sentences.en: Once again, I chose to confront the issue head-on.
sentences.cn: 我又一次选择了直接面对该问题。

sentences.en: Prepare themselves for the information - rich world they now confront.
sentences.cn: 为他们现在所面临的信息丰富的世界而早做准备.

sentences.en: She had decided to confront Kathryn with what she had learnt.
sentences.cn: 她决定拿自己了解的事实与凯瑟琳当面对证。

sentences.en: Some people need to confront a traumatic past; others find it better to leave it alone.
sentences.cn: 有人需要直面过去的创伤，有人则觉得不去想它为妙。

sentences.en: The difficulties that confront us seem insuperable.
sentences.cn: 我们面临的困难似乎是不可克服的.

sentences.en: The problems confronting the new government were enormous.
sentences.cn: 新政府面临的难题是巨大的。

sentences.en: They are eager to confront their guests with full frontal interrogations about their marriages.
sentences.cn: 他们急于当面直接质问客人的婚姻情况。

sentences.en: Troops were confronted by an angry mob.
sentences.cn: 与军队对峙的是一帮愤怒的群众。

sentences.en: We will confront them with focus and clarity and courage.
sentences.cn: 我们将目标集中地、立场鲜明地、勇敢地迎接这些挑战.

sentences.en: Would slay whoever dared confront Those moustaches that Bristled like porcupinequills.
sentences.cn: 杀人莫敢前,须如猬毛磔.

sentences.en: You need to confront those who have sided against you.
sentences.cn: 你要直面那些联合反对你的人。

trans.tran_cn: 面对，使面临，正视，与…对峙
trans.tran_en: if a problem, difficulty etc confronts you, it appears and needs to be dealt with

trans.tran_cn: 迎面遇到， 遭遇； 勇敢地面对； 使对质， 使当面对证
trans.tran_en: if a problem, difficulty etc confronts you, it appears and needs to be dealt with
